00015 
00016 void NavigationChallenge::AutonomousMode(string& waypointsFile, bool challange)
00017 {
00018         MotorController::setPortName("/dev/ttyS1");
00019         //interface that will be used by the reactive nav to sense the environment and make the robot move
00020         YclopsReactiveNavInterface* interface = new YclopsReactiveNavInterface();
00021         //initial position
00022         mrpt::poses::CPose2D pose = CPoint2D();
00023         float v = 0;
00024         float w = 0;
00025 
00026 
00027         interface->getCurrentPoseAndSpeeds(pose, v,w);
00028         double lat = pose.x();
00029         double lon = pose.y();
00030 
00031         cout << "lat: " << lat << " lon: " << endl;
00032         // solves the tsp problem, it autonomous challenge we need to add some code here to make it work.
00033         TSPNavigation nav = TSPNavigation(lat,lon);
00034 
00035         nav.loadPoints(waypointsFile);
00036         //waypoints in the order we want to visit them
00037         mrpt::aligned_containers<mrpt::poses::CPoint2D>::vector_t points = nav.solve(true);
00038 
00039         cout << "TSP Solved" << endl;
00040         //the reactive nav to get from the current position to the next point the tsp solver wants us to go to
00041         mrpt::reactivenav::YclopsNavigationSystem reactivenav = mrpt::reactivenav::YclopsNavigationSystem(*interface, true, true);
00042 
00043         mrpt::utils::CConfigFile navConfig("robot.ini");
00044         mrpt::utils::CConfigFile robotConfig("robotConf.ini");
00045 
00046         reactivenav.loadConfigFile(navConfig,robotConfig);
00047 
00048         cout << "Reactive nav intialized" << endl;
00049 
00050         mrpt::aligned_containers<mrpt::poses::CPoint2D>::vector_t::iterator iter = points.begin();
00051         mrpt::aligned_containers<mrpt::poses::CPoint2D>::vector_t::iterator end = points.end();
00052 
00053         //go until there aren't anymore waypoints
00054         while (iter != end)
00055         {
00056                 //setting up the next waypoint
00057                 mrpt::reactivenav::CAbstractReactiveNavigationSystem::TNavigationParams   navParams;
00058                 navParams.target.x = iter->x();
00059                 navParams.target.y = iter->y();
00060                 //distance from the waypoint in meters before the robot considers itself at the point
00061                 navParams.targetAllowedDistance = challange ?  0.20f: 7.0f;
00062                 navParams.targetIsRelative = !challange;
00063 
00064                 cout << "navigating to " << navParams.target.x << " " << navParams.target.y << endl;
00065                 //gives the reactive nav the next goal
00066                 reactivenav.navigate( &navParams );
00067                 while(reactivenav.getCurrentState() !=
00068                                                 mrpt::reactivenav::CAbstractReactiveNavigationSystem::NAVIGATING);
00069                 //go until it makes it to the point
00070                         while(reactivenav.getCurrentState() ==
00071                                                         mrpt::reactivenav::CAbstractReactiveNavigationSystem::NAVIGATING)
00072                 {
00073                         reactivenav.navigationStep();
00074                 }
00075                 ++iter;
00076         }
00077         //time for a victory dance
00078         for(int i = 0; i < 100; i++)
00079                 {
00080                         float v = .2;
00081                         float w = 40;
00082                         float time = 100000;
00083                         interface->changeSpeeds(v,w);
00084                         usleep(time);
00085                 }
00086 
00087 }
